Donate_Now_Language: Donate now and help your community
SiteDescription: Jisr Al-Rahma website is a website that aims to facilitate the process of donating to charitable organizations and charities.
hero_title: want to be a part of the solution? Donate now!
hero_subtitle: Your donation will help others to live a better life
Counter_Description: We possess extensive expertise in this field, having positively impacted numerous lives by facilitating a better quality of life.
Counter_Governorate_Description: Spanning multiple governorates, our mission is to reach and assist as many as possible. Through our initiatives, we aim to foster positive change and improve well-being.
Counter_Charity_Description: In partnership with charities, we focus on supporting those in need. Our joint efforts aim for meaningful, widespread community impact.
Counter_Donors_Description: We owe our progress to our donors, whose consistent support fuels our mission. Their trust enables us to make a lasting difference in many lives.
Counter_take_action: Embrace the impact of your first donation take action today and be the change.
News_disc: Stay updated with our latest news and events
Contact_Description: Have a question or need more information? Contact us!
ourLaunch_description: We have launched our website to help people to donate and help others.
FirstMove_description: We have made our first move by connecting to the best charity organizations.
SecondMove_description: We have made our second move by making our website available in multiple languages.
notNumber_disc: When you look at the statistics, it's easy to forget that every number represents a person. A person with a story, a family, and a life. A person who needs help. A person who needs you.
notNumber_take_action: Take an action today and be the change.
Who_We_Are_disc: We are a website that helps people to donate and help others. We are working with the best charity organizations to make the world a better place.
Our_mission_disc: Our mission is to guide individuals towards the best charity organizations, empowering them to contribute to a brighter future. We believe in the power of collective action to foster positive change, making it easier for everyone to reach out and make a difference.
Our_vision_disc: We envision a world transformed through generosity and solidarity. Our platform serves as a catalyst for good, inspiring people to donate and support one another. By motivating a community of donors, volunteers, and advocates, we aim to create an unstoppable force for global betterment.
about_end: We are working hard to make our vision become true.
donate_desc: Help us keep the lights on.
terms.title: Terms and Conditions for MercyBridge
terms.intro: Please read these Terms and Conditions ('Terms') carefully before using the MercyBridge website (the 'Service') operated by MercyBridge ('us', 'we', or 'our').
terms.acceptance: Your access to and use of the Service is conditioned on your acceptance of and compliance with these Terms. These Terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use the Service.
terms.agreement: By accessing or using the Service you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms then you may not access the Service.

terms.linksToOtherSites.title: Links To Other Web Sites
terms.linksToOtherSites.content: Our Service may contain links to third-party web sites or services that are not owned or controlled by MercyBridge.

terms.termination.title: Termination
terms.termination.content: We may terminate or suspend access to our Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

terms.governingLaw.title: Governing Law
terms.governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Egypt, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

terms.changes.title: Changes
terms.changes.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time.

terms.contactUs.title: Contact Us
terms.contactUs.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us.

help.title: Help Center & FAQs
help.intro: Here are quick answers to some common questions about using MercyBridge:
help.donationTitle: How can I make a donation?
help.donationSteps: To make a donation, simply follow these steps:
help.findCharitiesTitle: How do I find charities on MercyBridge?
help.findCharitiesDesc: You can find charities by utilizing our search feature or browsing through categories on our homepage. Each charity has a profile that provides detailed information about their mission, impact, and how your donation can help.
help.isSecureDesc: Yes, your donation is secure. We use industry-standard security measures to ensure that your personal and payment information is encrypted and protected during every transaction.
help.moreHelpDesc: If your question isn't answered here, or if you need further assistance, please reach out to our support team:
help.searchCharity: Search for the charity you wish to support using the search function or browse through the categories.
help.selectCharity: Select the charity of your choice to view more details about their mission and needs.
help.completeDonation: Follow the instructions to complete your donation through the payment gateway.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy for MercyBridge
privacy.introduction: MercyBridge ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting the privacy of our users ("user", "you"). This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website (MercyBridge.com) and use our services to connect with charitable organizations. We facilitate connections between users and charities without handling monetary transactions directly. By using our Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
privacy.informationCollection: We collect various types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you.
privacy.personalDataDesc: While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you ("Personal Data"). This may include, but is not limited to, your name and email address.
privacy.usageDataDesc: We may also collect information on how the Service is accessed and used ("Usage Data"). This Usage Data may include details such as your computer's Internet Protocol address (e.g., IP address), browser type, browser version, our Service pages that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, and other diagnostic data.
privacy.dataRetentionDesc: We retain your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies.
privacy.cookiesDesc: We may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Service.
privacy.useOfInformation: MercyBridge uses the collected data for various purposes:
privacy.disclosureOfInformation: We may disclose your personal information in the following situations:
privacy.securityOfData: The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacy.linksToOtherSites: Our Service may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit.
privacy.changesToThisPrivacyPolicy: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
privacy.contactUs: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
